message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I think that's a more reasonable price for the product.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $17,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $14,000?
